verses.1: Topa pen tuucin bangin hong cing hi a, kisapna teng kicing ta hi.
verses.2: Lo nona ah hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah hong paipih hi.
verses.3: Thahatna thak kei hong guan hi. A hong ciam sa mah bangin ah lampi man ah kei hong kha hi.
verses.4: Topa aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum le na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi.
verses.5: Keima galte º muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dim let ta hi.
verses.6: Na hoihna le nong itna in ka khantawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi.
